segments.text: Quite often . It is very convenient , saving me a lot of time .

segments.text: Do you have some experiences to share with me ? I want to have a try .

segments.text: You are asking the right person . Here are two very important tips . First , you need to visit no more than one site to find the best products and prices . I can recommend you some online merchants . Second , write your mail address correctly . Otherwise , you can â€™ t receive your delivery in time .

segments.text: What about the registration procedure ? Is that complicated ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at all . You just need to provide your name , address , e-mail address , phone number and bank or credit card information . I will help you with that .
